testcase.name: block-container reference-orientation bug36391
testcase.description: There's a problem involving nested block-containers and reference-orientation 180/-180.

testcase.name: block-container space-before space-after_3
testcase.description: Block-containers with no height currently don't create a fence for spaces as they should (they behave like a normal block).

testcase.name: block font-stretch
testcase.description: Font-stretch is not implemented, yet.

testcase.name: block linefeed-treatment
testcase.description: Preserved linefeeds in a fo:character are not handled correctly. Zero width space characters are not handled correctly.

testcase.name: block space-before space-after 8
testcase.description: An empty block currently produces a fence for stacking constraints which it shouldn't.

testcase.name: block white-space-treatment 1
testcase.description: White space around formatter generated linebreaks is not removed correctly.

testcase.name: block white-space-treatment 2
testcase.description: White space around formatter generated linebreaks is not removed correctly.

testcase.name: block word-spacing
testcase.description: Word-spacing may not work as expected.

testcase.name: block word-spacing text-align justify
testcase.description: Word-spacing may not work as expected.

testcase.name: external-graphic oversized
testcase.description: Images currently don't shrink so they fit on a page when they are too big and shrinking is allowed to happen.

testcase.name: external-graphic src uri
testcase.description: Doesn't work behind a proxy which requires authorization.

testcase.name: footnote space-resolution
testcase.description: Space resolution does not work between footnote regions.

testcase.name: inline block keep-together
testcase.description: Block-level content in fo:inlines may produce unwelcome results.

testcase.name: inline block nested 3
testcase.description: Block-level content in fo:inlines may produce unwelcome results.

testcase.name: inline-container block nested
testcase.description: Inline-container may not work as expected.

testcase.name: inline-container border padding
testcase.description: Inline-container may not work as expected.

testcase.name: inline letter-spacing
testcase.description: Letter-spacing may not work as expected within fo:inline.

testcase.name: inline word-spacing
testcase.description: Word-spacing may not work as expected within fo:inline.

testcase.name: leader alignment
testcase.description: Leader-alignment is not yet implemented.

testcase.name: leader leader-pattern use-content_bug
testcase.description: Line height is not correctly calculated for use-content leaders whose height is larger than the rest of the line.

testcase.name: list-block keep-with-previous
testcase.description: Keep-with-previous doesn't work inside tables and lists, yet.

testcase.name: list-item block keep-with-previous
testcase.description: Keep-with-previous doesn't work inside tables and lists, yet.

testcase.name: marker bug
testcase.description: White space on direct inline-level children of a marker is not handled correctly.

testcase.name: page-number-citation background-image
testcase.description: Background-images on page-number-citations are not placed correctly.

testcase.name: region-body column-count footnote
testcase.description: Footnotes may overlap with text of the region-body in multi-column documents.

testcase.name: region-body column-count bug36356
testcase.description: Column balancing in multi-column documents may not work as expected.

testcase.name: table-body background-image
testcase.description: The backgrounds of table-body, table-header, table-footer and table-column are not painted, yet.

testcase.name: table border-collapse collapse 1
testcase.description: Border-collapse="collapse" is not yet implemented.

testcase.name: table border-collapse collapse 2
testcase.description: Border-collapse="collapse" is not yet implemented.

testcase.name: table-cell block keep-with-previous
testcase.description: Keep-with-previous doesn't work inside tables and lists, yet.

testcase.name: table-cell_border padding_conditionality
testcase.description: Border and padding conditionality are not supported on table-cells, yet.

testcase.name: table-header background-image
testcase.description: The backgrounds of table-body, table-header, table-footer and table-column are not painted, yet.

testcase.name: table-row keep-with-previous
testcase.description: Keep-with-previous doesn't work inside tables and lists, yet.

testcase.name: table border-width conditionality
testcase.description: Border and padding conditionality are not supported on table-cells, yet.
